name: Connect More (connectmore)
description:
*UNFINISHED*

Connect More - Connect 4 but more! As a girl in the game, you get to play Connect Four games against different Bosses with extra power up features. 

Team Members: 

  • Cassia Chau - arts & dialogue writing
  • Georgina Qiu - arts
